summary.span: 允许对服务器上的 HTML 、 和 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML , , and elements on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类，以创建在网页上的按钮控件。Use the class to create button controls on a Web page. `` HTML 元素是在单击时没有任何默认行为的推送按钮。An `` HTML element is a push button with no default behavior when clicked. `` HTML 元素是提交窗体时单击的按钮。An `` HTML element is a button that submits a form when clicked. `` HTML 按钮将所有控件重都置为在单击时其初始值。An `` HTML button resets all controls to their initial values when clicked. 在 ASP.NET 2.0 中，使用类和类，以分别创建重置和提交按钮。In ASP.NET 2.0, use the class and the class to create Reset and Submit buttons, respectively. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件来创建命令按钮、 一个提交按钮和重置按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to create a command button, a Submit button, and a Reset button. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton/cs/htmlinputbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton/vb/htmlinputbuttonvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`type` 参数的值。The value of the `type` parameter.| 下表显示了不同的可能值为`type`参数。The following table shows the different possible values for the `type` parameter. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`button`|命令按钮。A command button.| |`submit`|提交到服务器窗体的按钮。A button that submits the form to the server.| |`reset`|清除窗体按钮。A button that clears the form.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的新实例控制是通过使用重载的构造函数。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the control using the overloaded constructor. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击 控件时是否执行验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果在单击 控件后执行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the control is clicked; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下执行页验证时单击控件。By default, page validation is performed when an control is clicked. 页验证确定输入的控件是否与全部通过指定验证控件的验证规则页上的验证控件关联。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 你可以指定或确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证时通过单击控件属性。You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an control is clicked by using the property. 若要禁止从正在执行的验证，请设置属性设置为`false`。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to `false`. 在事件处理程序通常使用此属性事件，以防止页单击取消或重置按钮时进行验证。This property is commonly used in the event handler for the event to prevent page validation from occurring when a Cancel or Reset button is clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以防止发生页验证。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent page validation from occurring. 请注意如何方法单独激活每个验证的控件。Notice how the method activates each validation control independently. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputButtonCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonCausesValidation/CS/htmlinputbuttoncausesvalidationcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputButtonCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonCausesValidation/VB/htmlinputbuttoncausesvalidationvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重写方法。The method overrides the method. 主要由控件开发人员使用。 is used primarily by control developers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法，以便它始终显示自定义使用粗体文本的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it always displays a custom control with bold text. span.span: A that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

summary.span: 这使您可以直接处理该事件。

span.span: This allows you to handle the event directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时单击控件。The event is raised when an control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 重置按钮不会引发事件。A Reset button does not raise the event. 创建 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和编写代码的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 事件处理程序的页上添加两个文本框的值，并显示结果。The event handler adds the values of the two text boxes on the page and displays the results. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButton/CS/htmlinputbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButton/VB/htmlinputbuttonvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputButtonServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonServerClick/CS/htmlinputbuttonserverclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputButtonServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonServerClick/VB/htmlinputbuttonserverclickvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 当 控件回发到服务器时引发此控件的事件。

span.span: Raises events for the control when it posts back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可供控件，单击时，引发事件。The method is used by the control, when it is clicked, to raise a event. 如果属性是`true`，则使用的控件中指定的组调用方法属性。If the property is `true`, the method is called using the group of controls specified in the property. 此方法主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的控件。This method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重写基基方法。The method overrides the base .method. 主要由控件开发人员使用。 is used primarily by control developers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法中的自定义服务器控件，以便为始终显示为工具提示，可访问的特定标题文本。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that specific title text, accessible as a ToolTip, is always displayed for the . [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputButtonRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputButtonRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlinputbutton_renderattributescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputButtonRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputButtonRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlinputbutton_renderattributesvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputButtonRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputButtonRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlinputbutton_renderattributes.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputButtonRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputButtonRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlinputbutton_renderattributes.vb#2)]

summary.span: 当在网页上单击 控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an control is clicked on the Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发此事件时单击控件。This event is raised when an control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 重置按钮不会引发事件。A Reset button does not raise the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和编写代码的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 事件处理程序的页上添加两个文本框的值，并显示结果。The event handler adds the values of the two text boxes on the page and displays the results. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButton/CS/htmlinputbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButton/VB/htmlinputbuttonvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputButtonServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonServerClick/CS/htmlinputbuttonserverclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputButtonServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonServerClick/VB/htmlinputbuttonserverclickvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
.property instance string ValidationGroup
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationGroup : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在 回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: The group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), indicating that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证组可以分配给特定类别的页面上的验证控件。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组从其他页上的验证组可以独立进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently from other validation groups on the page. 使用属性指定的验证组的名称为其控件回发到服务器时导致验证。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 此属性才起作用时，才的值属性设置为`true`。This property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 指定的值时属性，只是指定组的一部分的验证控件的验证时控件回发到服务器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果不指定此属性的值和属性设置为`true`，页面上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件时该控件回发到服务器进行都验证。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要验证时的控件控件回发到服务器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the controls to validate when an control posts back to the server. 页包含用于捕获用户数据的两个文本框和两个控制措施来确保用户未将一个文本框留空。The page contains two text boxes to capture data from the user and two controls to ensure that the user does not leave a text box blank. 控制的第一个文本框处于`CityInfoGroup`验证组并控制第二个框中为`StateInfoGroup`验证组。The control for the first text box is in the `CityInfoGroup` validation group and the control for the second box is in the `StateInfoGroup` validation group. 当`CityQueryButton`单击时，只有在控制`CityInfoGroup`验证组进行验证。When the `CityQueryButton` is clicked, only the control in the `CityInfoGroup` validation group is validated. 当`StateQueryButton`单击时，只有在控制`StateInfoGroup`验证组进行验证。When the `StateQueryButton` is clicked, only the control in the `StateInfoGroup` validation group is validated. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputButtonValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonValidationGroup/CS/htmlinputbuttonvalidationgroupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputButtonValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputButtonValidationGroup/VB/htmlinputbuttonvalidationgroupvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Introduction to the Validation Controls
